messageBody:

S

On 29 Jan 2003, at 07:16, Eric Armstrong wrote:

> Mike Clark wrote:
>
>> People tell me that books and articles with "testing" in the title
>> don't sell as well as they'd like. It's a shame really, and I hope
>> to
>> help change that mentality. One of my tactics in doing so, as you
>> well know, is to convince readers that testing is also a design
>> activity.
>
> "Testing as a Design Activity"
>
> Now there is a book I would buy in a heart beat. Because, as many of
> the posts in this forum inquire, "How do I go about designing my
> testing strategy?"
>

Steve Freeman
Winner of the Agile Alliance Gordon Pask award 2006
